name: Pro Skater 2D
description: A skateboarding game for tony hawk series fans! Over 70 various goals to beat in over 8 big levels! This game has all it needs for a complete skateboarding experience: - Over 30 tricks to beat - get special and make some special tricks - manuals and grinds with balance meter - secret gaps to find - combine tricks in big combos - do spine...
minimum_requirements: OS: 7+ Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 1000 MB RAM Graphics: any Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: any

reviews.review_text: Pretty good adaption of the 1991 classic Skate or Die: Tour de Thrash for the Nintendo Gameboy. I would've probably spent less time in this than I did, but I couldn't figure out how to exit the game. 6/10, gift to people as a joke when it's on sale for less than a cent.
